item.title: Samples
item.author: pete.witcher@gmail.com (Pete Witcher)
item.description: Samples of my technical writing I’ve documented different types of APIs, including web service APIs, software APIs, and hardware APIs. API documentation sample [IF150 RESTful API Guide](/API Guide - SSD.pdf) [NVMKV API Library](/API Guide - storage devices.pdf) Admin guide
